name: Space Trash (Allan Cudicio)
description:
Never trust a male space cocroach, they come from outer space, talk so smooth, seduce you... and then BOOM, 124 baby cocroaches and he disappears! Now it´s my duty to run after the children through this space dump before they or I chocke! Good think I can teleport at least...

This top down survival game was developed during the February Berlin Minigamejam

http://www.berlinminijam.de/2015/03/2015-february-...

I was involved in the game&level design, UI and presentation:

Team

Game Design: Allan Cudicio & Jamin Heinemann
Art: Andrew James & Leo D.
Code: Rezan Kilzigün & Josef Aub Aiseh
